member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_VIDEO_MOTION_ESTIMATOR
member.summary: Provides data for calls to when the feature specified is . Retrieves the motion estimation capabilities for a video encoder.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_VIDEO_MOTION_ESTIMATOR.NodeIndex
member.summary: In multi-adapter operation, identifies the physical adapter of the device this operation applies to.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_VIDEO_MOTION_ESTIMATOR.InputFormat
member.summary: A structure specifying the format of the input resources.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_VIDEO_MOTION_ESTIMATOR.BlockSizeFlags
member.summary: A bitwise OR combination of values from the enumeration specifying the encoder's supported search block sizes for motion estimation.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_VIDEO_MOTION_ESTIMATOR.PrecisionFlags
member.summary: A bitwise OR combination of values from the enumeration specifying the encoder's supported vector precision for motion estimation.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_VIDEO_MOTION_ESTIMATOR.SizeRange
member.summary: A structure representing the minimum and maximum input size supported by the driver. The driver sets the fields of this structure to zero if motion estimation is unsupported.
